name: cookiesjs
description: Intuitive cookie manipulation library for the front-end

scripts.build: rollup cookies.js --name cookies --output.format umd | uglifyjs -o cookies.min.js
scripts.installphantom: npm run phantomlib && npm run phantominst
scripts.phantomlib: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install build-essential chrpath libssl-dev libxft-dev libfreetype6 libfreetype6-dev libfontconfig1 libfontconfig1-dev
scripts.phantominst: cd ~ && export PHANTOM_JS="phantomjs-1.9.7-linux-x86_64" && wget https://bitbucket.org/ariya/phantomjs/downloads/$PHANTOM_JS.tar.bz2 && sudo tar xvjf $PHANTOM_JS.tar.bz2 && sudo mv $PHANTOM_JS /usr/local/share && sudo ln -sf /usr/local/share/$PHANTOM_JS/bin/phantomjs /usr/local/bin
